string.text: Scientific "Psi-helmet" (configured)

Configured "Psi-helmet". Developed under the guidance of Sakharov at scientific station near the lake Yantar (English "Amber"). Unique configuration of the helm, consisting of artifacts of electrical type and built-in antenna device, functions as a shield. When activated the helm creates something similar to an invisible dome around the owner. Running on the particle energy of an artifact "Shell", helm negates major part of emission. Remaining emission is deflected from protective system built into the framework of the helm itself. Uniqueness of the helm is in its capability to (in theory) withstand any kind of psy-emission, currently known in Chernobyl Exclusion Zone.
 
 %c[ui_red]ATTENTION:
 %c[default]Under no circumstances should this helm be exposed to electrical/thermal anomalous effects! This can lead to complete decay of protective properties.
 
 %c[ui_lime]SPECIFICATIONS:
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[default]Maximum psy-emission protection
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[default]Single prototype
Scientific "Psi-helmet" (unconfigured)

Unconfigured "Psi-helmet". Developed under the guidance of Sakharov at scientific station near the lake Yantar (English "Amber"). Unique configuration of the helm, consisting of artifacts of electrical type and built-in antenna device, functions as a shield. When activated the helm creates something similar to an invisible dome around the owner. Running on the particle energy of an artifact "Shell", helm negates major part of emission. Remaining emission is deflected from protective system built into the framework of the helm itself. Uniqueness of the helm is in its capability to (in theory) withstand any kind of psy-emission, currently known in Chernobyl Exclusion Zone.
 
 %c[ui_red]ATTENTION:
 %c[default]Under no circumstances should this helm be exposed to electrical/thermal anomalous effects! This can lead to complete decay of protective properties.
 
 %c[ui_lime]SPECIFICATIONS:
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[default]Maximum psy-emission protection
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[default]Single prototype
Leather jacket

Leather jacket which keeps its owner warm during bad weather conditions. Gives no protection, but is fitted with mouting points for additional modules.
 
 %c[ui_lime]SPECIFICATIONS:
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[default]lightweight outfit 
 %c[ui_lime]FEATURES:
 %c[ui_lime] • %c[default]increased durability
Cloak

Long soft cloak with special lining around torso and head providing some protection from anomalous effects. The best way to use it is in combination with gas mask or closed cycle respiration system. Equipped with two built-in mounting points for additional modules.
 
 %c[ui_lime]SPECIFICATIONS:
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[default]lightweight outfit 
 
 %c[ui_lime]FEATURES:
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[default]increased carrying capacity 
 
 %c[ui_lime]FACTION:
 %c[ui_cyan] • %c[default]bandits general outfit
Sphere M14 helm

Alumo-titanium helmet with fabric finishing, pockets for steel armor elements and armored mask. Supports installation of one 40mm PMK gas mask filter, as well as PVS-7B night vision. M12 is an armored helmet, available in the Zone. Its main purpose is to protect the head of its owner at the cost of significant weight increase.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] heavy armor tactical helmet

Sphere M12M helm

A helmet that is a standard component of a regular exoskeleton. Alumo-titanium helmet with fabric finishing, pockets for armor plates and armored mask. Supports installation of one 40mm PMK gas mask filter, as well as PVS-7B night vision. M12 is an armored helmet, available in the Zone. Its main purpose is to protect the head of its owner at the cost of significant weight increase.

M40 steel helmet

Regular military steel helmet. Made in Russia Does not provide protection against radiation or anomalies, but is capable of deflecting a bullet at the end of its trajectory. Was popular in the Zone only during first clashes between factions.

SSP-99 helmet

A helmet that has been disconnected from SSP-99 "Ecologist" costume. Air- and leakproof design for complete insulation from anomalous environments. Can be used in with military body armor to increase its efficiency in anomalous areas.

Gas mask EO-20 PBF

Upgraded and significantly more compact version of regular EO-19 PBF gas mask. A simple system filters air from radioactive particles and chemical agents, without any negative impacts on owner's mobility. Radiation protection has been significantly improved due to adding lead to the filters, although it's worth noting that this gas mask does not have the necessary durability for working in noxious environments. Gives almost no protection from physical damage.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] light gas mask 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:

Camo cloth mask

Camouflage-painted square of cloth folded into a mask shape. Used frequently by the stalkers as a protective measure for stopping the dangerous particles from getting into the organism. Is recommended for wearing even with no readings from Geiger counter, because the air can still be contaminated to some extent. Prolonged usage, however, can lead to toxic build-ups, implying the necessity of having a spare one for quick replacement.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] cloth mask

PMK Respirator

PMK-set consists of multi-layer 40mm respiration filter, located on the left. This system reduces the mobility of its owner, but provides decent radiation protection, even when the mask is slightly damaged. This type of equipment was designed for ukrainian special Spetsnaz, but its mass production has never been launched. Can be equipped with night vision device.

Tactical helm "Sphere-08"

High quality modern western-type helmet with air-filtering system built in. Consists of several layers of kevlar, providing protection from heavy physical damage. The helmet is made from composite dielectric materials, thus protecting the owner from electrical current.

Bodysuit "Wind of Freedom"

As lightweight as possible, this suit is made by the craftsmen of the Freedom faction. The fabric used to make this suit is treated with "Horizon" compound which significantly increases protective properties in anomalous environments. Equipped with built-in body armor and mounting point for additional modules.

Bodysuit PS5-M

Contemporary model of the Duty bodysuit. More suitable for novice stalkers, who are used to relatively lightweight suits. Unlike the PS3-series, gives good protection from anomalous effects and is capable of stopping a pistol round. Is not equipped with mounting points for modules, but it is possible to install different auxiliary systems.

Armored suit "Bulat"

Modern military armored suit for assault operations in the areas with anomalous activity. Components: PS3-12p series heavy body armor, bodysuit for protection against anomalies and compensatory costume. Provides excellent protection from bullets and fragments, and at the same time is comfortable and has almost no negative effects on the owner's mobility. Equipped with built-in mounting points for additional modules.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] reinforced armor

"SEVA" bodysuit

This suit was designed for exploratory expeditions in the Zone. It combines closed cycle respiration system and outer insulation coating, providing good protection from all types of anomalous effects. Has no defense from physical impact, thus providing very low level of protection from bullets and fragments. Equipped with built-in mounting points for additional modules.

Armored suit "Beryl-5M"

Adapted for the Zone environment PS5-series military body armor with beryllium spatter. It was designed for assault operations in highly irradiated areas, but its efficiency in anomaly-rich environments is quite low. Stalkers get these suits from the military, who exchange army equipment for different trophies from the Zone. It's fitted with mounting points for additional modules.

Bodysuit "Dawn"

Bodysuit presents a combination of double-layered rubberized fabric with plexiglass liner and built-in body armor. Despite the ability of pistol rounds to penetrate the armor, the suit is widely used due to its low cost and enhancement versatility. It's fitted with mounting points for additional modules.

Bodysuit "Guardian of Freedom"

Stalker's bodysuit with reinforced body armor, made by the Freedom craftsmen. Presents a successful combination of combat and anomalies protection. Built-in body armor made from armor plates and several layers of kevlar is capable of stopping a pistol round. The fabric has been treated with "Sovereign" compound. It's fitted with mounting points for additional modules.

Armored suit ChN-3b

Standard equipment of the "Clear Sky" assault squads. This protective suit can not only stop the automatic bullet, but also provides good protection against anomalies. Externally, the heavy armored suit resembles an exoskeleton, but the first and main difference that catches your eye is the absence of a helmet and servo on the hands and feet, and a battery behind your back. Due to this difference, a heavy armored suit is lighter than an exoskeleton and also allows its owner to run. Despite its popularity, the suit has never found its name.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] reinforced armor

SSP-99 "Yantar"

Created for working in the Zone environment, SSP-99 suit is used by scientific expeditions and collaborating stalkers-ecologists. Built in air filtering and conditioning system provides outstanding protection from radiation. Model "Yantar" gives excellent protection from high temperatures. Built in system negating the effects of anomalous activity provides average protection from chemical agents and electricity. Is not designed for combat operations and therefore does not provide any protection from neither bullets, nor fragments. Equipped with one built-in mounting point for additional module.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] reinforced suit with closed cycle respiration system

SSP-99 "Emerald"

Created for working in the Zone environment, SSP-99 suit is used by scientific expeditions and collaborating stalkers-ecologists. Built in air filtering and conditioning system provides outstanding protection from radiation. Model "Emerald" grants excellent protection from chemicals. Built in system negating the effects of anomalous activity provides average protection from high temperatures and electricity. Is not designed for combat operations and therefore does not provide any protection from neither bullets, nor fragments. Equipped with two built-in mounting points for additional modules.

Exoskeleton

Experimental prototype of military exoskeleton. Has never been mass produced due to extremely high cost and some flaws in design. Despite of the above, it's ability to significantly increase the mobility of its owner is highly popular and that is why it is being produced in small batches outside of Ukraine. You should avoid getting in contact with the owners of such exoskeletons, unless you have a death wish. It is possible to equip this suit with mounting points for additional modules.

Members of Duty prefer using heavy materials for better bullet protection, which literally turns the owner of this armor into a tank. Armor contains rigid metallic, plastic and ceramic plates, as well as flexible elements from aramid fabric. Very low protection from anomalies is the main drawback: even the weakest anomalies can destroy this tank in no time. No mounting points for additional modules.

SSP-99 "Diamond"

Created for working in the Zone environment, SSP-99 suit is used by scientific expeditions and collaborating stalkers-ecologists. Built in air filtering and conditioning system provides outstanding protection from radiation. Model "Diamond" grants excellent protection from electricity. Built in system negating the effects of anomalous activity provides average protection from chemical agents and high temperatures. Is not designed for combat operations and therefore does not provide any protection from neither bullets, nor fragments. Equipped with one built-in mounting point for additional module.

Freedom faction bodysuit M2

Upgraded version of the Freedom bodysuit. The middle class military body armor plus overhead reinforcing zirconium elements provide decent protection against intermediate caliber bullets and fragments at various distances. The material of the suit consists of two layers: specially treated leather and aramid fabric "Twaron". Gives some protection against various anomalous effects and radiation. It's fitted with mounting points for additional modules.

CS fighter's jacket

Standard equipment of "Clear Sky" fighter. Used by ordinary soldiers, scouts, subordinates in assault units. Base patrols also wear such jackets. Low protection against anomalous effects and bullet wounds are serious downsides, but there are three built-in mounting points for additional modules that allow for partial compensation of the shortcomings of this equipment.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] lightweight outfit

Black leather jacket

Traditional bandit outfit is a leather jacket with armor elements stitched into it. Provides some protection from harmful effects, however, extremely inadequate in the harsh conditions of the Zone. Equipped with one built-in mounting point for additional module.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] lightweight equipment 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
[ui_lime] • %c[default] increased carrying capacity
Newbie's outfit

The costume consists of brown shoes, jeans and a green Freedom jacket. The hood and mask cover the head and face of the defender of freedom in the Zone. In general, the anarchist suit is ready. Newcomers in "Freedom" wear such outfits for a start, and afterwards when they earn money and get stronger in a new place, they buy something more decent. Some of the stalkers do not throw out their first costumes, but put them in their personal stashes or carry with them. Others simply cut or tear off the patches and also carry them around, and the costume is sold or donated to a new generation of fighters. Protection from bullets and anomalies is low. Equipped with two built-in mounting points for additional modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] lightweight equipment 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
[ui_lime] • %c[default] "Psi-field" parameter is increased
Private Duty Jacket

The armor consists of pants, boots and a jacket with armored insets and elbow pads. Stalkers prefer to put on a hood and mask on the face. Low protection against bullet hits and anomalous effects. Perhaps it will save the owner from a PM bullet, but still, this is an excellent armor for the novice defenders of the Earth from the infection of the Zone. Equipped with one built-in mounting point for additional module.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] lightweight equipment 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
[ui_lime] • %c[default] "Tearing protection" parameter is increased
The novice's garb

The novice's attire is not at all suitable for the conditions in which the "Monolith" fighters live. Novice's clothes are worn by those who just arrived to serve the Monolith. Novices are often sent south for the assignment, the conditions are better there and it will be much easier to survive. A novice must first prove his loyalty to Monolith and his brothers and only then put on better equipment. Small protection against radiation, anomalous effects and bullet wounds. Equipped with two built-in mounting points for additional modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] lightweight equipment 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
[ui_lime] • %c[default] "Radiation sources" parameter is increased
Recruit's military uniform

Recruit's military uniform consists of army boots, camouflage pants and a camouflage jacket with a filing (undercollar). Regular lining might be a problem, so in the nearest future recruit will have to say goodbye to the filing. There is no bulletproof vest or armored inserts in the uniform, and because of this bullet protection is very low. Chances it will save the owner from radiation or anomalies are even lower. With such a uniform it is only possible to carry out simple assignments, intended for the rookies. But in view of the lack of an alternative, newcomers to the military forces wear this particular uniform - it is still better than being naked. Equipped with one built-in mounting point for additional module.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] lightweight equipment 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
[ui_lime] • %c[default] "Impact dampening" parameter is increased
Recruit Form

A uniform, worn by the new Syndicate recruits. Typically, recruits carry out simple orders and assignments to prove their loyalty to the Syndicate. This form is suitable for such easy tasks. Provides almost no protection from a bullet or an anomalous effects, but it is better than nothing. Besides, it is warm and comfortable. The face of the executioner should not be seen by anyone, just like the face of mercenary, so it is hidden under the mask. The hood will save from the rain, but not from the bullet. In terms of overall protection, the uniform is not very good, but for the newcomers of the Syndicate it will do just fine. Equipped with two built-in mounting points for additional modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]SPECIFICATIONS:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[default] lightweight equipment 
 
%c[0,170,170,170]FEATURES:
[ui_lime] • %c[default] "Tearing protection" parameter is increased
Armored suit "Sunrise"

Heavy-looking armored suit, reminiscent of an exoskeleton, but its obvious key difference is the absence of arm/leg servos, as well as the battery on the back. Due to this difference heavy armored suit is lighter than exoskeleton and grants its user the ability to run. All other characteristics are identical to exoskeleton, with slightly less protection from bullets, grenade explosions and impact. Despite its popularity, the suit still hasn't got a name of its own.

Ghillie suit

The costume is designed to simulate a "heap of foliage." Usually camouflage suits are worn by snipers and hunters to blend in to the environment and hide themselves from enemies. Ghillie suit is commercially produced, but the military and amateurs usually improve such suits themselves. Despite the high efficiency, the suit can be very impractical: even in conditions of a temperate climate, it quickly becomes very hot and is very heavy in itself.

"SEVA-M2" bodysuit

Modernized in one of the Kiev defense research institutes, this SEVA suit has already become a legend. The integrated bulletproof vest is capable of stopping only the pistol bullet, but the system of protection against anomalous effects is rightly considered unsurpassed. It has become possible due to enhancement capabilities. Many experienced stalkers prefer this particular model. Equipped with two built-in mounting points for additional modules.

SKAT-9M armored suit

SKAT-9M is a bulletproof military suit, which is designed for assault operations in areas of anomalous activity. Includes a heavy bulletproof tactical vest that provides excellent protection against bullets and fragments, and built-in advanced protection against anomalies. And all this does not reduce the mobility of the soldier. This costume is very rare in the Zone. Very few stalkers can say that they have the privilege of wearing it.

Standard Dawn suit with servos. Overall protection is the same as the one provided by the regular Dawn suit, but carrying capacity is significantly increased. One of the oldest types of costumes in the Zone.

GP-5M gas mask

GP-5 gas mask was designed to protect the civilian population of the Soviet Union from the radioactive fallout, and was made during the Cold War from 1962 to 1989. It is a helmet-mask made of white and black rubber, the lenses are held in place by crimping rims. The lower part of the mask is made of metal, there are valves and a filter holder. GP-5 is widely used by loners and bandits because of its availability and low price.

PM-1 gas mask

Upgraded and significantly more compact version of regular EO-19 PBF gas mask. A simple system filters air from radioactive particles and chemical agents, without any negative impacts on owner's mobility. Radiation protection has been significantly improved due to adding lead to the filters, although it's worth noting that this gas mask does not have the necessary durability for working in noxious environments. Gives almost no protection from physical damage.

Duty "Barrier" Helmet

Lightweight helmet with a sealed fence designed to protect the face from some abnormal influences. Judging by the technology, developed by the same defense research institute as the Dolga "Universal Protection" overalls, presumably, for use complete with army protective suits. It is used by Dolg group.
Sphere-08 Special Forces Arrow Tactical Helmet.

Modern, high quality Western-style helmet with integrated air filtration system. Designed to provide the commander of the unit with the maximum amount of tactical information when installing the appropriate electronic "filling". It features a reinforced design and is also equipped with a multi-layer Kevlar protection, XM40 gas mask and a first generation night vision device. This model is designed specifically for the elite special unit of the Army Special Forces "Arrow".
"Sphere -08" tactical helmet

High quality modern western-type helmet with built-in air-filtering system. It is designed to provide the unit commander with the maximum amount of tactical information with the appropriate electronic "filling" installed. It features a reinforced construction, and is also equipped with multi-layered kevlar protection, a XM40 gas mask and a first generation night vision device. This model is designed specifically for the Duty faction.
"Sphere-08" tactical helmet

High quality modern western-type helmet with built-in air-filtering system. It is designed to provide the unit commander with the maximum amount of tactical information with the appropriate electronic "filling" installed. It features a reinforced construction, and is also equipped with multi-layered kevlar protection, a XM40 gas mask and a first generation night vision device. This model is designed specifically for the Freedom faction.
Clear Sky helmet "Sphere M12"

The helmet is trimmed with a titanium-aluminum cloth, which provides good protection from firearms and also some protection from psi-radiation. The kit comes with an armored mask with a built-in respirator and a first generation night vision device. Supports installation of one 40mm PMK gas mask filter. M12 is one of the most secure helmets available in the Zone, its main task is to protect the owner's head at the cost of a significant increase in weight. This model was designed specifically for the Clear Sky faction.

SSP-99M "Ruby"

High-quality modified SCP-99M bodysuit, which has improved protection from high temperatures, bullets and fragments. Also provides excellent protection against radiation. Designed to equip the security guards of scientific expeditions. Model "Ruby" grants excellent protection from mutant attacks. Also, the wound healing system is integrated in the costume. Built-in system negating the effects of anomalous activity provides average protection from chemical agents and electricity. Equipped with two built-in mounting points for additional modules.

SSP-99 "Topaz"

Created for working in the Zone environment, SSP-99 suit is used by scientific expeditions and collaborating stalkers-ecologists. Built in air filtering and conditioning system provides outstanding protection from chemicals. Model "Topaz" grants excellent protection from radiation. Built in system negating the effects of anomalous activity provides average protection from electricity and high temperatures. Is not designed for combat operations and therefore does not provide any protection from neither bullets, nor fragments. Equipped with one built-in mounting point for additional module.

SEVA bodysuit with a tactical vest

Created by Sultan's faction under the guidance of a man nicknamed Prozrachny (English "Transparent"). These jumpsuits were stolen and redone, now only "real ballers" of the Zone wear them. Closed cycle breathing system is built-in. The system for suppressing the anomalous fields has suffered a little, but is still acceptable for the Zone, some of the bandits even procure artifacts in such suits. The body armor has gained a little in protective characteristics, but nevertheless does not hold out to its analogue PSZ-9Md. The main advantage of this suit is its high carrying capacity. Equipped with two built-in mounting points for additional modules.

A stolen batch of "Dawn" jumpsuits, converted by Prozrachny (English "Transparent"). Bodysuit presents a combination of double-layered rubberized fabric with plexiglass liner and built-in body armor. The main advantage of this suit is its high carrying capacity. Equipped with one built-in mounting point for an additional module.

"PSZ-9d-Sphere" helmet

"PSZ-9d-Sphere" helm, modified by Duty technicians to suit the faction needs. The gas mask provides increased protection from radiation and chemical threats. Finished with fabric, aluminum-titanium helmet is equipped with armored mask. And pockets for steel armor elements. Supports installation of one 40mm PMK gas mask filter, as well as PVS-7B night vision. M12 is an armored helmet, available in the Zone. Its main purpose is to protect the head of its owner at the cost of significant weight increase.
